page.title: 09INTERESTING PEOPLE.
page.content: Mrs.Pyle's father and grandfather both had tailors in Whickham and her aunt used to be the only baker in the village. She had 4 brothers and 3 sisters. One of her brothers was killed during the First War. He was killed on the day before he was due to come home on leave. One of his friends was afraid to do guard duty so her brother took his place. He was shot by a German sniper. Mrs.Pyle was very sad about this. When she was a little girl the street lights were gas not electric. She told us about a man called old Michael, whose job it was to light the lamps each evening. He had only one arm so he was given the job as lamplighter. We enjoyed talking to Mrs.Pyle and wished we could have stayed at her house for a longer time.
